Module WitchHunt

Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players

package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players
This package contains all elements defining the players, their possible actions within the game and the notifications they can send towards the view level of the MVC architecture.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sos.witchhunt.model
    This package contains all interfaces and classes that are used at plural levels of the MVC-architecture's model.
    fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies
    This package's purpose is to propose an all-in-one set of tools used to define CPU-controlled players' artificial intelligences,
    fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards
    Contains all components defining the different types of cards that are used in this game with their effects, as well as structures for easing their manipulation.
    fr.sos.witchhunt.model.flow
    Contains all classes in charge of controlling the flow of the match, aggregating together and supervising the model's components.
  • Class
    Description
    CPUPlayer
    This class represents a CPU-controlled player.
    DefenseAction
    This enum represents the possible actions a player can perform when they are accused or targetted by a Hunt! effect.
    HumanPlayer
    This class represents a human-controlled player.
    Player
    This abstract class defines common behavior and specifies required abstract methods for both human and CPU players.
    PlayerDisplayRequester
    Interface implemented by Player and its daughter classes.
    PlayerInputRequester
    Interface implemented by Players and their daughter classes
    TurnAction
    This enum represents the possible actions a player can perform during his turn.
